menuItems.name: Classic Burger
menuItems.description: A juicy beef patty with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and our secret sauce, served on a toasted brioche bun.

menuItems.name: Veggie Burger
menuItems.description: A delicious plant-based patty with avocado, sprouts, and all the fixings.

menuItems.name: Quinoa Salad
menuItems.description: Healthy and refreshing salad with mixed greens, quinoa, avocado, and a lemon-tahini dressing.

menuItems.name: Avocado Toast
menuItems.description: Toasted sourdough with fresh avocado, chili flakes, and a sprinkle of sea salt.

menuItems.name: Iced Tea
menuItems.description: Freshly brewed black tea, chilled to perfection and served with a slice of lemon.

menuItems.name: Margherita Pizza
menuItems.description: Classic pizza with San Marzano tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.

menuItems.name: Espresso
menuItems.description: A strong and aromatic shot of coffee, perfect for a quick energy boost.

menuItems.name: Chocolate Cake
menuItems.description: Rich and decadent chocolate layer cake with a smooth fudge icing.
